home_message: A world full of plants is a better world. We want to become your favorite place for everything related to the world of plants: from different types of plants, pots and designer accessories, to personalized advice and treatments. Our mission is to help you find your ideal plant to fill your spaces with style, life and warmth
shipping_message: Your order will be shipped as quickly as possible. Our standard is to deliver orders in perfect condition. Due to the sensitivity of our products, we pack our orders as sufficiently and securely as possible. We do this in such a way that even a longer delivery time does not harm the plants.
cookies_rgpd: We use cookies in order to provide the services and features offered on our site and to improve the experience of our users. Cookies are data downloaded or stored on your computer or other device.
errorMessageContact: An error is acknowledged when sending the message
footer_social_medias_motto: Join us on social networks to find out more about our products and our deals.
security: You are on a security page. All data information are encrypted with SSL certificate.
empty_cart: Your cart is empty, please select a product to add
product_added: The product was added to your card
errorOffline: No internet connection, please try later
newsletter_subscribe: Subscribe to our newsletter and get 20% off coupon code !
